item.description: Please join us for our monthly potluck fiesta! This month we will be celebrating Mexican food. This (mostly) Spanish conversation fiesta takes place at a private home on the town line between Hartford and West Hartford. Bring a SMALL amount of food to share. If you can, let us know in your RSVP what you'll bring. Meet new friends who share your interest in improving or maintaining language skills.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Spanish Language May Meeting
